title: Document minimum nodejs version
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Running on node v10 doesn't fail during install or build. It results in an Error

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Specifying a minimum version in the root `package.json` `"engines"` field 
**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Including an `.nvmrc` file

**Additional context**

Here is the error encountered. This [issue](https://github.com/AssemblyScript/assemblyscript/issues/1081#issue-555901279) suggests its related to node v10. I confirmed reinstalling + rebuilding on node v12 resolved the issue.
```

                ^
```
